attributes.action: Call for the complete overall of the UK immigration system, in particular recent changes in immigration rules.
attributes.additional_details:
Seeking an overhaul of the UK immigration system, in particular recent changes in immigration law - create a fair system that does not exclude a large section of the population from being with their partner.

Set a fair figure with regard to earnings that accurately reflects the average full time salary of people all over the country (i.e. North vs London), or alternatively change this to a set figure that a sponsor must have left over each month after outgoings

Set a realistic savings figure that again reflects average income and outgoings, and consider the current economic climate, or scrap this requirement.

Formulate a clear, transparent application process that does not give room for misinterpretation.

Create an effective system to limit the number of undesirable immigrants from entering the country, consider a points based system similar to that of Australia and Canada.

Limit the number of immigrants from the EU and stop penalising those from the rest of the world
